title: Opinion: STAT+: China biotech’s Cambrian explosion
description: Chinese biotech is in the midst of a full-blown Cambrian explosion, writes Brian Finrow.
content: Chinese biotech is in the midst of a full-blown Cambrian explosion, writes Brian Finrow.
